title: Who braids Shyvana's hair?
body:
I doubt it's Shyvana herself, since her hands are glowing claws of fire, which actually look like they're melting off (that has to be really painful, no wonder she's so angry). Unless her hair and skin are all kinds of burn-proof, there has to be someone else doing it for her, right?

http://puu.sh/cTTcu/a0d0fc8e31.jpg
